# TODO: Return configured web page in case of system issues.
 from DateTime import DateTime
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 service = portal.portal_secure_payments.find()
 integration_site = portal.restrictedTraverse(portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredPayzenIntegrationSite())
 system_event_kw = {
 'portal_type': 'Payzen Event',
 'source_value': service,
 'destination_value': context,
 }
 system_event = portal.system_event_module.newContent(title='User navigation script', **system_event_kw)
 
 now_utc = DateTime().toZone('UTC').asdatetime()
 today = now_utc.strftime('%Y%m%d')
 transaction_id = str(portal.portal_ids.generateNewId(
 id_group='%s_%s' % (service.getRelativeUrl(), today),
 id_generator='uid')).zfill(6)
 
 mapping_id = '%s_%s' % (today, transaction_id)
 if not integration_site.getMappingFromCategory('causality/%s' % context.getRelativeUrl()) == 'Causality/%s' % context.getRelativeUrl():
 system_event.confirm(comment='Transaction already mapped in integration tool.')
 return 'There was system issue'
 try:
 integration_site.getCategoryFromMapping('Causality/%s' % mapping_id, create_mapping_line=True, create_mapping=True)
 except ValueError:
 mapping = integration_site.Causality[mapping_id]
 mapping.setDestinationReference('causality/%s' % context.getRelativeUrl())
 else:
 system_event.confirm(comment='Key %s already found!' % mapping_id)
 return 'There was system issue'
 
 try:
 context.setStartDate(now_utc)
 except:
 system_event.confirm(comment='It was impossible to modify start date')
 return 'There was system issue'
 
 portal.portal_workflow.doActionFor(context, 'edit_action', comment='Start date set as payment is being registered')
 try:
 portal.portal_workflow.doActionFor(context, 'confirm_action', comment='Confirmed as payment is being registered')
 except:
 system_event.confirm(comment='It was impossible to confirm the transaction')
 return 'There was system issue'
 
 payzen_dict = {}
 payzen_dict.update(
 vads_currency=integration_site.getMappingFromCategory('resource/currency_module/%s' % context.getResourceReference()).split('/')[-1],
 vads_amount=str(int(round((context.PaymentTransaction_getTotalPayablePrice() * 100), 0))),
 vads_trans_date=now_utc.strftime('%Y%m%d%H%M%S'),
 vads_trans_id=transaction_id,
 vads_language='en',
 )
 system_event.confirm()
 system_event.acknowledge(comment='Automatic acknowledge as result of correct communication')
 return service.navigate(page_template='payzen_payment', pay='Click to pay', payzen_dict=payzen_dict)
